verses.verse: שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> You עֹבֵ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> Thou [art] to pass over הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> this day אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan לָבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> to go in לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> nations גְּדֹלִ֥ים <S%H1419><s%> greater וַעֲצֻמִ֖ים <S%H6099><s%> and mightier מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H4480><s%> than עָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> than thyself cities גְּדֹלֹ֥ת <S%H1419><s%> great וּבְצֻרֹ֖ת <S%H1219><s%> and fenced up בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> to heaven

עַֽם־ <S%H5971><s%> A people גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> great וָרָ֖ם <S%H7311><s%> and tall בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children עֲנָקִ֑ים <S%H6062><s%> of the Anakims אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you יָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> whom thou knowest וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you שָׁמַ֔עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> and [of whom] thou hast heard מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who יִתְיַצֵּ֔ב <S%H3320><s%> [say] Who can stand לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children עֲנָֽק׃ <S%H6061><s%> of Anak

וְיָדַעְתָּ֣ <S%H3045><s%> Understand הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> therefore this day כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> that it יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> who הָעֹבֵ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> [is] he which goeth over לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> before אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire אֹֽכְלָ֔ה <S%H398><s%> thee [as] a consuming ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יַשְׁמִידֵ֛ם <S%H8045><s%> he shall destroy וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> and He יַכְנִיעֵ֖ם <S%H3665><s%> them and he shall bring them down לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before thy face וְהֽוֹרַשְׁתָּ֤ם <S%H3423><s%> so shalt thou drive them out וְהַֽאַבַדְתָּם֙ <S%H6><s%> and destroy מַהֵ֔ר <S%H4118><s%> them quickly כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD לָֽךְ׃

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֹּאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Speak בִּלְבָבְךָ֗ <S%H3824><s%> not thou in thine heart בַּהֲדֹ֣ף <S%H1920><s%> hath cast them out יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> after that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֨יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֹתָ֥ם ׀ <S%H853><s%> מִלְּפָנֶיךָ֮ <S%H6440><s%> from before לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> thee saying בְּצִדְקָתִי֙ <S%H6666><s%> For my righteousness הֱבִיאַ֣נִי <S%H935><s%> hath brought me in יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לָרֶ֖שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> this land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וּבְרִשְׁעַת֙ <S%H3423><s%> doth drive them out הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> of these nations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מוֹרִישָׁ֥ם <S%H7564><s%> but for the wickedness מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> from before

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> for בְצִדְקָתְךָ֗ <S%H6666><s%> Not for thy righteousness וּבְיֹ֙שֶׁר֙ <S%H3476><s%> or for the uprightness לְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <S%H3824><s%> of thine heart אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you בָ֖א <S%H935><s%> dost thou go לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצָ֑ם <S%H776><s%> their land כִּ֞י <S%H3588><s%> because בְּרִשְׁעַ֣ת ׀ <S%H3423><s%> doth drive them out הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> of these nations הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God מוֹרִישָׁ֣ם <S%H7564><s%> but for the wickedness מִפָּנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> from before וּלְמַ֜עַן <S%H4616><s%> order הָקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> thee and that he may perform אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <S%H7650><s%> sware יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob

וְיָדַעְתָּ֗ <S%H3045><s%> Understand כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> because בְצִדְקָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H6666><s%> it for thy righteousness יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> therefore that the LORD אֱ֠לֹהֶיךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לְךָ֜ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַטּוֹבָ֛ה <S%H2896><s%> thee not this good הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <S%H3423><s%> to possess כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people קְשֵׁה־ <S%H7186><s%> churlish עֹ֖רֶף <S%H6203><s%> stiff-necked אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

זְכֹר֙ <S%H2142><s%> Remember אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁכַּ֔ח <S%H7911><s%> [and] forget אֵ֧ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you הִקְצַ֛פְתָּ <S%H7107><s%> to wrath אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> not how thou provokedst the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness לְמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיּ֞וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you יָצָ֣אתָ ׀ <S%H3318><s%> that thou didst depart out מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּֽאֲכֶם֙ <S%H935><s%> until ye came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto this place הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this מַמְרִ֥ים <S%H4784><s%> ye have been rebellious הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <S%H1961><s%> have been עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וּבְחֹרֵ֥ב <S%H2722><s%> Also in Horeb הִקְצַפְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7107><s%> to wrath אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיִּתְאַנַּ֧ף <S%H599><s%> was angry יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> so that the LORD בָּכֶ֖ם לְהַשְׁמִ֥יד <S%H8045><s%> with you to have destroyed אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

בַּעֲלֹתִ֣י <S%H5927><s%> When I was gone up הָהָ֗רָה <S%H2022><s%> into the mount לָקַ֜חַת <S%H3947><s%> to receive לוּחֹ֤ת <S%H3871><s%> the tables הָֽאֲבָנִים֙ <S%H68><s%> of stone לוּחֹ֣ת <S%H3871><s%> [even] the tables הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which כָּרַ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> made יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD עִמָּכֶ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> with וָאֵשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> with you then I abode בָּהָ֗ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mount אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> and forty לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> nights לֶ֚חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> neither אָכַ֔לְתִּי <S%H398><s%> I neither did eat וּמַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> water לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁתִֽיתִי׃ <S%H8354><s%> nor drink

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> delivered יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> unto me two לוּחֹ֣ת <S%H3871><s%> tables הָֽאֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> of stone כְּתֻבִ֖ים <S%H3789><s%> written בְּאֶצְבַּ֣ע <S%H676><s%> with the finger אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַעֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> and on כְּֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> them all הַדְּבָרִ֡ים <S%H1697><s%> and on them [was written] according to all the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּר֩ <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD עִמָּכֶ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> at בָּהָ֛ר <S%H2022><s%> with you in the mount מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> of the fire בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הַקָּהָֽל׃ <S%H6951><s%> of the assembly

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came מִקֵּץ֙ <S%H7093><s%> And it came to pass at the end אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> of forty י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> and forty לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> nights נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> [that] the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֛י <S%H8147><s%> me the two לֻחֹ֥ת <S%H3871><s%> tables הָאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> of stone לֻח֥וֹת <S%H3871><s%> [even] the tables הַבְּרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me ק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> unto me Arise רֵ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> get thee down מַהֵר֙ <S%H4118><s%> quickly מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> here כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for שִׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> have corrupted עַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> from hence for thy people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הוֹצֵ֖אתָ <S%H3318><s%> which thou hast brought forth מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt סָ֣רוּ <S%H5493><s%> turned aside מַהֵ֗ר <S%H4118><s%> [themselves] they are quickly מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> out of the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּיתִ֔ם <S%H6680><s%> which I commanded עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> them they have made לָהֶ֖ם מַסֵּכָֽה׃ <S%H4541><s%> them a molten image

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Furthermore the LORD אֵלַ֣י <S%H413><s%> about לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> unto me saying רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> I have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and indeed עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people קְשֵׁה־ <S%H7186><s%> churlish עֹ֖רֶף <S%H6203><s%> stiff-necked הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

הֶ֤רֶף <S%H7503><s%> Let me alone מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <S%H4480><s%> than וְאַשְׁמִידֵ֔ם <S%H8045><s%> that I may destroy וְאֶמְחֶ֣ה <S%H4229><s%> them and blot out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמָ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> their name מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> from under heaven וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> and I will make אֽוֹתְךָ֔ <S%H854><s%> of לְגוֹי־ <S%H1471><s%> thee a nation עָצ֥וּם <S%H6099><s%> mightier וָרָ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> and greater מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> than

וָאֵ֗פֶן <S%H6437><s%> So I turned וָֽאֵרֵד֙ <S%H3381><s%> and came down מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> from the mount וְהָהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> and the mount בֹּעֵ֣ר <S%H1197><s%> burned בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire וּשְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> and the two לֻחֹ֣ת <S%H3871><s%> tables הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> were in שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> [were] in my two יָדָֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> hands

וָאֵ֗רֶא <S%H7200><s%> And I looked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> you had indeed חֲטָאתֶם֙ <S%H2398><s%> and behold ye had sinned לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God עֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <S%H6213><s%> [and] had made לָכֶ֔ם עֵ֖גֶל <S%H5695><s%> calf מַסֵּכָ֑ה <S%H4541><s%> you a molten סַרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5493><s%> ye had turned aside מַהֵ֔ר <S%H4118><s%> quickly מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַדֶּ֕רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> out of the way אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וָאֶתְפֹּשׂ֙ <S%H8610><s%> And I took בִּשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> the two הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <S%H3871><s%> tables וָֽאַשְׁלִכֵ֔ם <S%H7993><s%> and cast מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> them out of שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> my two יָדָ֑י <S%H3027><s%> hands וָאֲשַׁבְּרֵ֖ם <S%H7665><s%> and brake לְעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> them before your eyes

וָֽאֶתְנַפַּל֩ <S%H5307><s%> And I fell down לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כָּרִאשֹׁנָ֗ה <S%H7223><s%> as at the first אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> and forty לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> nights לֶ֚חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> neither אָכַ֔לְתִּי <S%H398><s%> I did neither eat וּמַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> water לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁתִ֑יתִי <S%H8354><s%> nor drink עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all חַטַּאתְכֶם֙ <S%H2403><s%> because of all your sins אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חֲטָאתֶ֔ם <S%H2398><s%> which ye sinned לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> in doing הָרַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> wickedly בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְהַכְעִיסֽוֹ׃ <S%H3707><s%> to provoke him to anger

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יָגֹ֗רְתִּי <S%H3025><s%> For I was afraid מִפְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> of הָאַף֙ <S%H639><s%> the anger וְהַ֣חֵמָ֔ה <S%H2534><s%> and hot displeasure אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which קָצַ֧ף <S%H7107><s%> was wroth יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> wherewith the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> against לְהַשְׁמִ֣יד <S%H8045><s%> against you to destroy אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> you But the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about גַּ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> also בַּפַּ֥עַם <S%H6471><s%> unto me at that time הַהִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וּֽבְאַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> with Aaron הִתְאַנַּ֧ף <S%H599><s%> angry יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> was very לְהַשְׁמִיד֑וֹ <S%H8045><s%> to have destroyed וָֽאֶתְפַּלֵּ֛ל <S%H6419><s%> him and I prayed גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also בְּעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> for אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> for Aaron בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> also the same time הַהִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> the same

וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַטַּאתְכֶ֞ם <S%H2403><s%> your sin אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <S%H6213><s%> which ye had made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֵ֗גֶל <S%H5695><s%> the calf לָקַחְתִּי֮ <S%H3947><s%> And I took וָאֶשְׂרֹ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> and burnt אֹת֣וֹ ׀ <S%H853><s%> בָּאֵשׁ֒ <S%H784><s%> it with fire וָאֶכֹּ֨ת <S%H3807><s%> and stamped אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> טָחוֹן֙ <S%H2912><s%> it [and] ground הֵיטֵ֔ב <S%H3190><s%> [it] very small עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דַּ֖ק <S%H1851><s%> dwarf לְעָפָ֑ר <S%H6083><s%> as dust וָֽאַשְׁלִךְ֙ <S%H7993><s%> and I cast אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲפָר֔וֹ <S%H6083><s%> the dust אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַנַּ֖חַל <S%H5158><s%> thereof into the brook הַיֹּרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> that descended out מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> of the mount

וּבְתַבְעֵרָה֙ <S%H8404><s%> And at Taberah וּבְמַסָּ֔ה <S%H4532><s%> and at Massah וּבְקִבְרֹ֖ת הַֽתַּאֲוָ֑ה <S%H6914><s%> and at Kibrothhattaavah מַקְצִפִ֥ים <S%H7107><s%> to wrath הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <S%H1961><s%> become אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> ye provoked the LORD

וּבִשְׁלֹ֨חַ <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Likewise when the LORD אֶתְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> מִקָּדֵ֤שׁ בַּרְנֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H6947><s%> you from Kadeshbarnea לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying עֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> Go up וּרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H3423><s%> and possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I have given לָכֶ֑ם וַתַּמְר֗וּ <S%H4784><s%> you then ye rebelled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֤י <S%H6310><s%> against the commandment יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> neither הֶֽאֱמַנְתֶּם֙ <S%H539><s%> and ye believed ל֔וֹ וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8085><s%> him not nor hearkened בְּקֹלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6963><s%> to his voice

מַמְרִ֥ים <S%H4784><s%> Ye have been rebellious הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <S%H1961><s%> have been עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD מִיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> from the day דַּעְתִּ֥י <S%H3045><s%> that I knew אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וָֽאֶתְנַפַּ֞ל <S%H5307><s%> Thus I fell down לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> and forty הַלַּ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> nights אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הִתְנַפָּ֑לְתִּי <S%H5307><s%> as I fell down כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> had said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [at the first] because the LORD לְהַשְׁמִ֥יד <S%H8045><s%> he would destroy אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וָאֶתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <S%H6419><s%> I prayed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> therefore unto the LORD וָאֹמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> and said אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> O Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּשְׁחֵ֤ת <S%H7843><s%> destroy עַמְּךָ֙ <S%H5971><s%> not thy people וְנַחֲלָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H5159><s%> and thine inheritance אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom פָּדִ֖יתָ <S%H6299><s%> which thou hast redeemed בְּגָדְלֶ֑ךָ <S%H1433><s%> through thy greatness אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom הוֹצֵ֥אתָ <S%H3318><s%> which thou hast brought forth מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt בְּיָ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָֽה׃ <S%H2389><s%> with a mighty

זְכֹר֙ <S%H2142><s%> Remember לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servants לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּ֗פֶן <S%H6437><s%> look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at קְשִׁי֙ <S%H7190><s%> not unto the stubbornness הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> of this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> of this וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רִשְׁע֖וֹ <S%H7562><s%> nor to their wickedness וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חַטָּאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2403><s%> nor to their sin

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Otherwise יֹאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> say הָאָרֶץ֮ <S%H776><s%> Lest the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הוֹצֵאתָ֣נוּ <S%H3318><s%> whence thou broughtest us out מִשָּׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> in it מִבְּלִי֙ <S%H1097><s%> was not יְכֹ֣לֶת <S%H3201><s%> was not able יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Because the LORD לַהֲבִיאָ֕ם <S%H935><s%> to bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> which he promised לָהֶ֑ם וּמִשִּׂנְאָת֣וֹ <S%H8135><s%> them and because he hated אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> הוֹצִיאָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> them he hath brought them out לַהֲמִתָ֥ם <S%H4191><s%> to slay בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> them in the wilderness

וְהֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they עַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> Yet they [are] thy people וְנַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5159><s%> and thine inheritance אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom הוֹצֵ֙אתָ֙ <S%H3318><s%> which thou broughtest out בְּכֹחֲךָ֣ <S%H3581><s%> power הַגָּדֹ֔ל <S%H1419><s%> by thy mighty וּבִֽזְרֹעֲךָ֖ <S%H2220><s%> arm הַנְּטוּיָֽה׃ <S%H5186><s%> and by thy stretched out פ
